attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public
attributes.additional_details:
Animal Welfare: Fireworks' loud noises and bright lights can be terrifying for pets and wildlife, causing stress and even physical harm.

Human Safety and Wellbeing: The unregulated use of fireworks can be dangerous, and people, especially those with conditions like PTSD, may suffer from the sudden loud noises.

Environmental Concerns: Fireworks contribute to pollution and leave behind waste that affects natural habitats.
attributes.background: Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public. The concerns behind this petition are related to the negative impact of fireworks on both animals and humans.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700013
